title: Bridge of Hope Discussion, Part One
description: This message really brings you back to the reality of what the children of Asia go through. Abuse, abandonment, neglect, starvation, no school, some are even abandoned as infants.â€ Children need love, they need someone to nurture them and show them they are loved. Our Bridge of Hope centers in Asia do this exact thing. God is doing so much with what we have established but there are still so many kids in Asia who need love and to be taken in.

title: Bridge of Hope Discussion, Part Two
description: Imagine if your kids were living on the streets of India with no roof over their head and no one to look after them. You would do anything you could to help them right? Just because the children of India are not in our country, doesnâ€™t mean we canâ€™t help them. We are content in our homes and are blessed to have food to eatâ€”these kids need that too.

title: Bridge of Hope Maranatha
description: Teaching from Mark 9 and 10, K.P. shows us Jesus' heart for the world's lost and forgotten children.

title: The Impact One Life Can Have, Part One
description: After returning from tsunami-stricken areas of Asia, K.P. Yohannan shares real-life stories of courageous native missionaries in Asia.

title: The Impact One Life Can Have, Part Three
description: The story of the woman who impacted K.P.'s life-and thousands through him-will challenge and inspire you in part three of this message.

title: The Impact One Life Can Have, Part Two
description: In part two of this message, K.P. discusses the things God has given you to impact the world.
